website_summaries.verdict: A gaming chair with all of the perks and comfort you would expect from a premium product.
pros: Integrated arms and controls provide more function than a simple gaming chair

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who plays on his PS4 pretty much daily. He's 6'3 and fits in the chair comfortably, assembly was very easy, he assembled it himself in probably 10 minutes. I'm really glad I got this chair, music sounds amazing the volume is perfect and the bass is lit. Overall a really great product, I usually don't do Amazon reviews but I had to review this because this really is great. And worked good with our smart t.v.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with XBox One (without additional converter purchase)
customer_reviews.text: Great rocker, but be warned the audio is NOT compatible out of the box with XBox One. After some research we purchased an HDMI audio extractor box Musou HDMI Audio Extractor V1.4,HDMI...  To make this work. Once we got that hooked up; chair works great (one more cord I wasn’t thrilled about) Chair is comfortable and of good quality. The sound is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on this product it has a poor ...
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money on this product it has a poor quality stitching on the seating part, mine start ripping after six months.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph O. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work from the box & not customer service to speak of....
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess this review is more about the product not working a all than whether or not I like it. The chair does not emit ANY sound whatsoever and when I called the manufacturer (Twice) I was told that someone from their "Tech" department would call me back. That was over a week ago and I still haven't heard from them. Amazon will ship a replacement chair and I will update the actual quality of sound when I receive the new one. If it works of course.
customer_reviews.author: DaBears!

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son sat in it for an hour and had a sore neck and back. He hardly ever complains and was really excited about the chair, so I knew it was bad. As an adult, sitting in it was uncomfortable for me too. The headrest seems oddly placed and there’s no lumbar support. When you sit, you tip back, so you use your back and leg muscles to keep you from going too far. It’s a cool looking chair. I haven’t tried the speakers yet (my son games with headphones), but I’m sure they’re fine. Unfortunately this chair just doesn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: astromatt

customer_reviews.title: Cool, unbelievably cool
customer_reviews.text: Cool, unbelievably cool.my soon to be 13 year old and my 47 year old..lol are in love with this. Its almost like a car seat and super comfy. Get one today
customer_reviews.author: susan styles

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with awesome sound!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 of these chairs and they are a huge hit with the entire family. They are comfortable even for adults. The sound is exceptionally good. The kids love the chairs both for gaming as well as for watching movies. I would definitely recommend them to anyone Looking for comfortable and sturdy game chairs.
customer_reviews.author: JoLinda Crump

customer_reviews.title: This chair may -or may not - “rock” your world
customer_reviews.text: This chair may make some gamers happy but the one in my family hated it. Frankly, I was pretty glad he did because the thing’s just huge and very unwieldy. Re-packing it up and hauling it to the UPS store to return it took two people. This should *NOT* be an impulse purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Charla45

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are fine but you can't hook them up to current technology TV's and game systems so don't waste your money. Just get a chair with no speakers. Current TV's and game systems don't have rca out connections so they are imposso let hook up
customer_reviews.author: Mr. And Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs, but poor electronics
customer_reviews.text: The chair is nice, but the first time audio RCA cables were plugged in and then unplugged from the chairs (yes on both chairs I bought) it pulled the jacks out of the chairs. In doing this, it also pulled the connections apart. I now have two nice looking chairs that don't have sound. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bacorn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Comfty & Loud
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It's not too big or small. It has a little pin in the back to allow for folding & security when in use -- DON'T LOSE IT. The speaker volume is crrrrazy loud which I like! It sounds like Club Mez in my house. We've had now going on a year & it's still all good. I would definitely recommend anyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yazzy

customer_reviews.title: This company cannot / will not support replacement parts for this item.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great while it lasted. We purchased in July 2018 and by October 2018 it no longer had any sound. After email conversations with the company, we were told the problem would be an easy fix and it only required a new control panel, which we could easily replace ourselves. Unfortunately, we had to be placed on a waiting list to recieve the part. I have given Ace Casual / Ace Bayou a month to provide this part before providing a negative review. The company also advised they would not provide a replacement rocker. I now have a chair with no sound and no way to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: IGW Signs

customer_reviews.title: but for those looking to buy for the head speakers will likely be disappointed. I got it to work for a minute ...
customer_reviews.text: i mostly bought the chair for the purpose of a chair, but for those looking to buy for the head speakers will likely be disappointed. I got it to work for a minute once but then next time I tried it didn't. I haven't bothered since because i have no need or desire for the trouble, but regardless it's pretty comfy but can fall backwards in certain situations (more likelyu on wood floors than carpet) so be careful. Arms will loosen if you try to use them to move the chair, so be sure only use them as arm rests.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Mg son is 5’10 and this is perfect. The video doesn’t do justice on the sound. The bass is absolutely amazing. We didn’t use the wireless connection, instead we connected the controller to the gaming chair via the mic input as seen on the video.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Z. Alba

customer_reviews.title: To avoid a war, buy everyone thier own chair!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. He has had the same floor gamer chair for at least ten years and refused to throw it out, even though it keeps falling apart because couple herniated discs and it seems to be the only chair that doesn't cause more irritation. He absolutely loves it! Says it's 10 times more comfortable than his old one. The only problem is, he has to get our children off it so he can use it. The speaker is great; He said it feels like he's in the game, and I love it too because he's not blasting the whole living room with his video game audio!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a christmas gift for my 10 year old son and he loved it!! This chair exceeded my expectations the audio on this bad boy are awesome!! The speakers are built within the chair, so its easy to hear your explosive onscreen actions or if you just want to hear your music playlist while playing your video games you can do that too. The chair is well made and super comfy It looks sweet and its audio backs it up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: DOA: Speaker Issues
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I hooked this up a week before Christmas, as the right speaker made hissing and cracking sounds that were louder than the audio coming out of them. Left side sounded fine, so assuming just a bad speaker on the right. Because the vinyl is sealed and stapled in the back, rather than velcro shut, you really can't get access to troubleshoot it yourself (and replacing it, given the design, wouldn't be easy, either). Long story short, I just printed the return slip and shipping this junk back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Plato

customer_reviews.title: back support falls forward when you lean over
customer_reviews.text: i truly thought i would love this chair, but there were a few things that sort of made it less suitable for what i needed. positives: comfortable sitting cushion, parts for handle assembly come organized to put together, easy to initiate rocking motion negatives: when you lean in the back of the chair also falls forward as the chair is a folding type and there’s no way for me to lock it in. big and bulky as well as heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Can’t figure out how to use the gaming chair whatsoever. Arms were a hassle to get in because the holes weren’t lining up properly and we can’t even get the sound to connect to the tv. Waste of money! We basically just have an expensive chair with flimsy arms now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ZERO customer service!!! Complete waste of time and money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair hasn't worked from the day we opened it. Amazon sent me straight to the manufacturer and after MONTHS of emails and phone call attempts, we have received ZERO response from the manufacturer. This was my son's "santa" present last Christmas and has been nothing but a very expensive seat. So very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbelry

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for the kids' game room we're setting up. These are fantastic. Easy to assemble, comes with all the cords and power you need. Plugged the transmitter into the back of the TV via RCA and immediately connected to the chairs. No cords needed. Aside from the power supply to get power to the chairs. That's the only real negative...that you have to have a cable running to the chairs from an outlet. At least with our setup. Speakers are great! Actually have to turn them down. Kids love these chairs!
customer_reviews.author: JJBB

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We've had this chair now for two months. It's primarily used by my 9 year old and his friends as they play on the XBox. It puts out really good sound for the person in the chair, and is very comfortable. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars and not 5 is that the arm rests tend to loosen over time. With the kids constantly moving them up and down, a monthly tightening seems necessary. I wish this part was designed a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old. It was easy to assemble but it's pretty awkward to lift once its put together so I suggest putting it together where you intend to use it. My daughter just liked the chair at her friends house so it wasn't bought for technically a gaming chair. However, she plugs her Switch into it and likes the speakers while playing. Overall we have been very happy with the purchase. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars for "gaming" is because I'm not sure excately how it would work if we hooked it up to the television
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 year old son. He's about 5'11" 140 lbs. He fits easily in this chair and says it very comfortable. I can fit easily in the chair also about 6'1" 225 lbs. The chair seems sturdy enough for him but I don't know about me even though I fit into it. The shipping was good and some assembly for the arms which was very easy to put together. It does come with cabling for the stereo portion but he hasn't used it because he prefers his headphones which are wireless. I think it will last the next 4 years until he goes to college and then he can get his own.lol
customer_reviews.author: jfink11

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this was great for this chair the sound is good the comfort and support is wonderful for hours of gaming.
customer_reviews.author: M.Fields

customer_reviews.title: Product is good. Amazon don't always have ur best interests🤬
customer_reviews.text: Looks good so far. Only I ALMOST DIDN'T GET THE PACKAGE. IT WAS DELIVERED 2 BLOCKS AWAY. The COMPLETE STRANGER was nice enough to come find me! I had to lug this 50lb box TWO BLOCKS IT SAID SIGNATURE REQUIRED. OBVIOUSLY I DIDN'T SIGN. And there's no way to complain. So i do it here. F🤬🤬🤬 YOU, AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dreeemer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gamer chair
customer_reviews.text: The only complaints were that one of the arm holder holes was drilled improperly and the screw could not fit right. Also the pin that goes on the backside of the chair to keep it locked upright could not slide into the metal loops because they were misaligned. Otherwise the speakers are loud & work well off of my sons PS4. He loves his chair.
customer_reviews.author: Divine_Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and design
customer_reviews.text: The chair came without the arms attached. They went on easy. It sounds and looks amazing. My son has been thrilled with it. He almost doesn't sit in anything else now. If it breaks or we have any issues, I will update the review. 1 year update: I dropped a star off because the arm broke off of the chair. I have a house full of guys and they are rough on things, but we kept this chair in a bedroom where it didn’t see daily use. I’d like my furniture to last longer than a year before it needs pieces reattached.
customer_reviews.author: HDDC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable. My son loves it. Mine came with a power cable. He likes how he can hook up his sound to the chair. Only issue I had was the box it came in smelled of cigarette smoke, which made the chair smell of smoke. And not just a little like when you walk past someone who smokes. It was full on hotbox. Almost like they smoked for two years straight and blew the smoke in the box, exclusively. Assuming it came from the manufacturer like that. It took a some fans, some baking soda, a lot of Febreze, and a few days and the smell went away. Other than that, this chair is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: works well including wireless audio, but plan to replace the power transformer
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason that most of the "Customers Who Bought This Item Also Bought" items are replacement power adapters and/or power cord extensions. Ours died after a couple months, and the cord length does limit placement of the chair, and you have to be careful not to rock on it. Luckily I had another 9volt adapter that seems to work. If I do buy a replacement, I will also get the power adapter for the wireless audio transmitter. Other than that, the chair and the speaker system in it have been working well. I left the arms off so I can put it in the closet when not in use for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Keller

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Game Chair for my Grandson!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this gaming chair for my grandson's birthday and he loves it. The sounds, vibrations and controls are all of the greatest quality and he virtually Lives in the chair after school if the weather outside is nasty (like Northern Colorado can be). A great gift if you have a gamer in your family.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair & sound, needs better set-up directions
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable chair for gaming. Directions are lacking and need to be updated. With new TVs you just plug the remote Bluetooth sensor in to the red/white plugs in back of TV but you need to manually turn it on and off to communicate directly to the chair for sound. Not the latest technology but it still works and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: MARISA P SERANO

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, electronic connections break easy though.
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely comfy and I love rocking in it as I sit back. The folding arms are great when I need to do work and need the space. The plugs for the built in speakers are not the best. They slowly break down. The speakers still work, but the connections are what fall apart, eventually the speakers are just for show. The chair is worth the price on its own, especially because you can fold it up when you need to put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Markku J.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for comfort
customer_reviews.text: The chair is ok for just a chair. The sound and speaker stop working rather quickly. For the price you would think it would be better quality. If you ar buying for comfort then it la good, but if you are buying it to enhance your gaming experience then I would definitely shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Material!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Only comes with a 90 day warranty ((now I know why!)) after only 6mos of use, the chair is beginning to fail. The leather is cracking in various places, but most noticeable at the headrest. See pic. PLEASE DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: The Tech Specialist

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. HE LOVES IT! It's sturdy, comfortable, and he says the sound is great. He's very happy with his gift, and I am very happy that I was able to get a quality product for a little less than I thought I would have to spend!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Back support while gaming
customer_reviews.text: I bought two chairs, I liked the looks of the gaming chair but one of the chair has a problem, the back rest is not proper, it’s falling or folding inside and it’s quiet irritating
customer_reviews.author: Raj Maradana

customer_reviews.title: Really like these chairs.
customer_reviews.text: As far as gaming chairs go, THIS is the right one to buy for the full effect. While I'm not thrilled with the padding on the chair - it's not uncomfortable, just not as plush and plump as some other models - it has forward facing speakers right next to your head on both sides for the surround sound effect, so you feel like you are IN THE GAME. It's marvelous.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Rubio

customer_reviews.title: It won’t  suit everyone
customer_reviews.text: It’s HEAVY AND BIG AF. And if in direct contact with hard flooring, it’ll will leave a gray mark on the floor, is basically the plastic scraping on your floor, like the design and it’s comfortable. But not 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac M.

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Lots of static noise from speaker
customer_reviews.text: Chair is decent quality but the speaker has constant static. Would have returned it but told our son it was a gift from Santa so....
customer_reviews.author: Judy Long

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: Chair softness is like a leather car seat. Not much support for lower back but a small pillow fixes that. Great sound for music and gaming and the rocking is nice since I tend to jiggle my legs and fidget a ton. Great size for adults and kids.
customer_reviews.author: Michaella

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Was never able to hook up. This product is not as advertised. Bought for son, it is not comparable with gaming systems, have to buy after market connections, and still will not work with 3 different types of gaming systems. Does not work for: xbox one Xbox 360 Playstation 3
customer_reviews.author: Pclilly6

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for my 16 year old nephew
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this chair he is a gamer and he is dedicated to the game so I felt he needed a nice comfy chair to get him through the late nights. LOL! It's comfortable and the speakers are great for the bedroom. Great price for the gift for a gamer!
customer_reviews.author: TiAlmondJoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 yr old. It is nice but very heavy so if you have to lift it to move around need to be careful if you are older or cant lift heavy things. The only complaint is that the arms wont stay tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work - Defective!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift received from Santa Claus. It does not work. We have tried everything and must return since it is defective. We even bought and returned a HDMI Converter thinking it was the problem. It is the chaif-DEFECTIVE and does mot work!!!!! Customer Service does not exist and no one calls you back! Extremely disappointed...and it will be returned!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Knight

customer_reviews.title: the Hook-Up was easy. I did however have one issue which was ...
customer_reviews.text: I I give the chair 5 Stars it was a Christmas gift and my son loves it, the Hook-Up was easy. I did however have one issue which was I ordered it to be delivered on Christmas Eve. I was here all day and no one knocked or wrong on the doorbell but to my surprise I saw a sticker on the door to say they attempted delivery. It was also supposed to be left unattended in the event of no one being home however it was not delivered and I was unable to give it to my son on Christmas Day. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & speakers are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome! My 12 year old son who is really into gaming absolutely loves this chair & I don’t think he’s gotten out of it since we gave it to him for Christmas! Speakers are excellent quality as is the rest of the chair. So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, terrible assembly experience
customer_reviews.text: Works well but assembly is terrible. It appears the screws and holes don’t line up exactly which makes assembling the arms a real challenge. I gave up on the second arm. But the chair is pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.author: LG1906

customer_reviews.title: my son is in love with the graphic quality (over the old Xbox 360)
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little confused that since this isn't compatible out-of-box with Xbox One, the company's website doesn't address this, nor does it provide links to the converting equipment you may need. Their Q&A doesn't cover this either. I'm using an HDMI cable directly to the TV, my son is in love with the graphic quality (over the old Xbox 360), so I'm not sure if I will reduce quality with whatever fix I need for the sound to work. Would have bought a simple gaming chair if I had known, or gotten the converting add-on if I knew ahead of time. I feel a little ripped off. Will see what the company says when I let them know...
customer_reviews.author: SR Schore

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost ergonomically that you're super uncomfortable there's no lower back support. Second the speakers are weak like very weak. 3rd the connection the wires it's all ridiculous and my son doesn't even use it after all I honestly regret making this purchase I should have just got a basic computer chair
customer_reviews.author: Ashley's Review

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I gave easy to assemble 3 stars because we didn’t have the right stuff plus my son wanted it ..it’s a great product plus it’s keep the children in one area
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but short for a taller person
customer_reviews.text: This chair has really good sound and is easy to hook up. I'm 6'3" and the top of the chair comes to my shoulders. So its not effective for leaning your head back if you are tall. Still a good chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Fun rocking chair for movies
customer_reviews.text: Fun rocking chair to watch movies. We’re not using the gaming plugins but the speakers are a fun feature. With a rambunctious 8 year old, the arms become loose pretty easily so have to tighten them often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for lounging in
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing this do the the other reviews but everything came perfect. It’s comfortable and sturdy. I had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Couple small issues
customer_reviews.text: The arm rests loosen with use. Probably can just add a slightly longer spacer inside the hole for the arm rest so it doesn't turn the bolt when you move the arm rest. Plugs for holes to cover bolts do not stay in very well and fall out.
customer_reviews.author: leopardlizzy

customer_reviews.title: Improve their posture, but this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old. It improved his posture when gaming or on his iPad. Took a few minutes to put the arm rests on and wired up his headset. It’s fun to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: too low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: I should've read better, but this is too low for tv mounted on wall. I will probably give a away and order another chair that does not sit on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: willie timothy davis

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Xbox one
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Does not work with my son’s Xbox one. In the description it says it does, but it lies. Will never make this kind of purchase on line again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky. Uncomfortable. Bad audio
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable bulge on butt. Squeaks when you rock it. Audio Bluetooth cuts in and out. My 9 yo kid hated it. Didn’t use it. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Chair is convenient for gaming but we didn’t like this chair because it causes back pain and the material seems cheap. It’s not comfortable to seat for a long period of time not enough cushion and the arch in the back doesn’t hug your back at all. Also if you lay back a little it flips backwards. So you can’t really put your weight into it which is stressing and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 12 year old sons sensory needs for reading time or to relax more than for a video chair. I choose this one as it will last long and is durable and well made. The cheap small ones would not last long for a soon to be teen who is already very tall. I love sitting in it and rocking as well!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hubby Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband who loves to play video games. This was a great birthday present and the cost and quality made it that much more special.
customer_reviews.author: TIFFANY

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and bass, good value.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair. The speakers in the headrest simulate surround sound and when the bass hits in the seat the vibration really gets him into the game. Bought this chair because of the value.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN ANDREWS

customer_reviews.title: Packaging leaves a little to be desired
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived with "rocker" printed on the tape all over the box. It is Christmas and my son (who the gift was for) brought the chair in! He asked is this a gaming rocker?? I mean really?? nothing like ruining a surprise with packaging. Geez.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: I got 2 and my kids love them. I had a problem with one - ...
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 and my kids love them. I had a problem with one - the plastic had a cracked on the base, but I got a new one right away with no problem. But be aware! It's very heavy and hard to carry. So don't plan on moving it around to different rooms or different floors.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Sanderz

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter and my two grandchildren each one of these. Caught them on sale. Made them very happy. Would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal F.

customer_reviews.title: 9yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Son for for Xmas and was ecstatic! Easy to put together. Connecting the chair to the Xbox was frustrating, but other than that I’d purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MNelson

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and were a big hit with my husband and ...
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU HAVE A PS4.... or a TV with a digital audio output you need to buy a converter in order for these to work. Get a digital to RCA converter. These also have to be plugged into a power source, just FYI. They are comfortable and were a big hit with my husband and my son.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Strong

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed the chair came without the arm brackets, I had to buy another device so I can connect the chair transmitter so I can use it wirelessly and it's supposed to be the wireless chair
customer_reviews.author: rakion21

customer_reviews.title: Great gamer chair.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on a lighting deal. Everything is there to run then chair. The only complaint is the wireless transmitter for the sound runs out of batteries within a week with heavy use. Might want to get a power adapter I'd you don't want to go through a ton of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair but couldn't ever get the wireless audio to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair but couldn't ever get the wireless audio to work. My husband and I are both in the computer technology field and we couldn't get it to work. Didn't return... Used occasionally as gaming chair but overall a bit of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Christie A. Allred

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, but features on the chair doesnt work well
customer_reviews.text: Speakers for the chair is really bad, can barely hear from it. otberwise the chair is comfortable, but might as well buy one without the speakers
customer_reviews.author: KikerTech

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this chair He uses this chair for gaming. Now I have to get my other grandson this chair. He loves it also.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this chair, he says it’s magic and lets him beat levels he never could before.
customer_reviews.author: T. Faucett

customer_reviews.title: This chair will be worth tour purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My som love it, comfortable and surround sounds on chair, he said its exactly what he wanted !!!
customer_reviews.author: LadyGirlMel

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my SO. He loves it! He sits in it every day and even watches TV in it. Definitely one of the best presents I've gotten him.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ann

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a big box might need help carrying it into the house
customer_reviews.text: My 13y old loves this gaming chair. He thought it was very cool! Easy to assemble with just a few steps
customer_reviews.author: So Boston

customer_reviews.title: Great chair....makes playing video games much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this chair. I am 5-10, and about 165 lbs, and it fits me perfect. However, I have a few friends that are bigger (6-2ish) and they like it too. I use this to play video games with my kids, and I have been very pleased. I also like that it folds up (without breaking it), and can be stored easily in a closet when you need it out of the way. However, keep in mind that it weighs a meaningful amount, so your wife might not be able to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I've found better for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: The chair is ok, I've found better for cheaper, Not to mention they sent me two right arms, with no way to resolve it before christmas morning- it sucked- after two attempts to get it resolved, i was over it and decided to just use it with no arms- Just look around, you can get better quality for the amount of money this one cost-
customer_reviews.author: ira

customer_reviews.title: Gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: Item purchased as a gift. Recipients well pleased with this item. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Neil K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great for gaming or chatting- both my husband and teenage daughter use this chair for different reasons and both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: keep looking, this chair sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I do not normally have such strong negative reactions to a product but putting this chair together was so frustrating. The only assembly required is to put on the arms but the pre drilled holes did not match up and we spent all night trying to put them on. my advice is keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: T. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Works great though and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Wish there was a rechargeable battery pack instead of being tethered to the wall. I would pay extra money for this feature. Works great though and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and how comfortable it is and the fact that there's very little assembly to do. Although it's not the easiest to setup. I'm still using it without any of its features because it was confusing when I opened the box (it didn't communicate with my PS4) and I never went back to do it. With that being said, no complains about shape, durability or comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Andre L

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any kid gamer
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not for an adult. But, I got tired of watching my kids sit on their knees to play games. Ouch! This is a great but for the price. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: HTown80

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son loves this chair. He says it’s very comfortable and stable. I know that it is easily movable for when the vacuum comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product !
customer_reviews.text: The best Xmas gift for my son !! To play, rest, listen music, also, to nap !!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mabelle Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for each of my sons so there would be no fighting. Glad I did. Chairs were easy to put together and are of nice quality. The boys say they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K. OHARA

customer_reviews.title: Men loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it, the bass is awesome and loud. He spend hours on it playing his ps4 and shipping was very fast. I love it
customer_reviews.author: mae

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy chair.  Seems to be holding up.  VERY limited instructions, good luck!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my son. Attempted pre assembly, but the directions are only for the sound part. There is literally NOTHING on the arm assembly, even online. It's really not that difficult once a friend showed me, but they should have instructions for where to put all the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my gaming daughter and she loves it and the support it gives her back.
customer_reviews.author: ALgirl

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Adult Sized Gaming Chair
customer_reviews.text: My X rocker ll arived a couple hours ago the assembly took me about 15 minutes, this chair is perfect for anyone near or over 6 feet I'm 6'1 and around 230 lbs, this chair is plenty comfortable, and it don't roll back like those smaller V Rockers do, it pretty much stays in a upright but slightly tilted back position and your head will not be over the head rest so don't worry about that, I'm able to run game sound and mp3 music through the chair at the same time, i absolutely love this chair, and by the way I'm using this with the Xbox one
customer_reviews.author: HUSTLExMAN_JOE

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming chair ever
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He is really enjoying the whole experience of gaming now.
customer_reviews.author: S. Celeste Morris

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so nice! So easy to put together ,so comfortable ,and so easy to move around. It was a present for my grandson and he loves it so much! I would recommend buying this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Weise

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, speakers are not bad, is not Bose but they are decent. Expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Boyfriend and I ended up using it! I like that you can rock in it
customer_reviews.author: D Rod

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for our grandsons
customer_reviews.text: Both of our boys love the unit. Can't get them out of the chairs!!
customer_reviews.author: John Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: BAD COMPANY AND PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my son for Christmas and the power button does not work. I have tried numerous of times to contact company and No one will contact me back. So now I have this chair that doesn't work and an sad kid that keeps looking at it. DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU WANT A LOT OF ISSUES AND WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good chair.....bought 3......one had to be sent back as the speaker in the seat did not work which is reason for 4 stars instead of 5........amazon return was easy and replacement works fine....keep in mind the chair does need to be plugged in to a wall outlet...wireless transmitter is battery operated and does use the batteries (aaa) quickly if you leave it on.....overall happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Rich S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except my chair did not include the cables so I could never test the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

product_meta.title: Ace Bayou X Rocker II SE 2.1 Black Leather Floor Video Gaming Chair for Adult, Teen, and Kid Gamers with Armrest and Headrest - High Tech Audio and Wireless Capacity - Ergonomic Back Support
product_meta.description: Welcome to the world of interactive audio! With the X Rocker Wireless Floor Gaming Chair, regular and professional gamers alike can now not only hear sounds of the game, but actually feel it. Whether you are listening to music, watching a movie, or playing a game, you will become a part of the excitement. The X Rocker has wireless audio transmission, and 2.1 sound system with two built-in speakers and subwoofer. The side control panel has volume, bass control, input/output jacks, band switch, and a headphone jack for personal use. Play for hours in comfort with the the ergonomic design, padded headreat, armest, and full rocking motion. The foldable construction allows for ease of storage and portability. This gaming chair has a easy to clean, heavy duty upholstery vinyl cover for your convenience. Connects to most video game, audio or video devices.
feature_bullets: ALL PURPOSE GAMING CHAIR: Leather lounging game chair can be used for playing video games, watching movies and TV, listening to music, reading, and relaxing.

IMMERSIVE MEDIA EXPERIENCE: Chair incorporates wireless audio transmission, two speakers near the headrest and subwoofer positioned to pound your back with bass-heavy sounds intensifying your game, movie, or music.
HEADPHONE JACK: Plug in headphones and adjust the bass and volume control on the side jack for personal usage.
COMPATIBILITY: Connects to Xbox, PlayStation, Gameboy, MP3/CD/DVD, and home theater systems. Weight Capcity 275 lbs.

CONNECTS WITH MULTIPLE CHAIRS: Control panel includes separate volume and bass controls, and input and output jacks for connecting to your audio source so other X-Rocker chairs can join in multi-game mode.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
